tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE habitat_loss_rate (
  region_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  habitat_area_km2 FLOAT,
  year INT,
  habitat_loss_rate FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE habitat_loss_data (
  data_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id UUID,
  habitat_type TEXT,
  area_km2 FLOAT,
  year INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_region FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES habitat_loss(region_id)
);

CREATE TABLE habitat_loss_rates (
  rate_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  region_id UUID,
  loss_rate FLOAT,
  year INT,
  CONSTRAINT fk_region2 FOREIGN KEY (region_id) REFERENCES habitat_loss(region_id)
);
